title: 表示论坛说要在服务器帖子上加什么收费标准 可是我一修改就变成......怎么破啊！！！
txt_content:
如题！！！就变成这样了！！Discuz! Database Error(1054) Unknown column 'server_profit' in 'field list'UPDATE forum_optionvalue3 SET server_name='圣域の国度' ,server_mode='1' ,server_compatibility='25' ,server_profit='8' ,server_gamemode='1' ,server_network='3' ,server_hosttype='2' ,server_onlinemod='2' ,server_software='8' ,server_modnew='1' ,server_whitelist='2' WHERE tid=283083 AND fid=179
